items.title: A look at Indian startups like TuluAI, which are building LLMs for low-resource languages by creating data sets nearly from scratch with community involvement (Rest of World)
items.summary:
Rest of World:
A look at Indian startups like TuluAI, which are building LLMs for low-resource languages by creating data sets nearly from scratch with community involvement  —  Indian founders are building digital data sets for low-resource languages by involving the community, and count on local relevance to go against big tech platforms.

items.title: Ubisoft’s €1.16 Billion Deal With Tencent Has Gone Through
items.summary:
Ubisoft has confirmed that its €1.16 billion (~RM55.3 billion) deal with Chinese conglomerate Tencent has officially concluded. The French video game studio confirmed that the latter’s investments has been completed, giving it a 26.32% share in their co-founded outfit, Vantage Studio. “Today’s closing crystallises the value of our world-class IPs and marks a pivotal milestone […]

items.title: Official Amazon iPhone 15 Pro and 16 Pro/Max Black Friday deals now live: Up to $811 off orig. prices (Renewed Premium)
items.summary:
It’s to take a look at some official iPhone Black Friday deals – specifically iPhone 16 Pro/Max and iPhone 15 Pro/Max. Amazon’s Black Friday Week sale is rolling now and we are actually seeing some official iPhone deals in there courtesy of its Renewed Premium program. Just about every piece of current-gen Apple gear is now on sale for the big holiday, but Amazon’s Renewed program that delivers easily some of the best prices on unlocked iPhone units is ready to go too – deals start from $598 with as much as $811 off the original prices. Details awaits below.

more…

items.title: Official 2025 Google Black Friday deals now live: Pixel Watch 4 up to $100 off, Pixel 10 up to $300 off, more
items.summary:
The official 2025 Google Black Friday sale is now live. We are looking at hundreds in savings across the new Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro, deals on Pixel Buds Pro 2, and the first notable cash discount on the new Pixel Watch 4. These deals also include a host of Google smart home gear in the form of its new Nest Cams, the latest Learning Thermostat, and the recently-released Nest Doorbell 3rd gen. Everything is now live and you can get a closer look below.

items.title: LEGO Insiders Weekend live today! Browse promotions and gift ideas: Botanicals, Icons, Star Wars, Super Mario, more
items.summary:
Following the usual November schedule, LEGO’s Insiders Weekend will go live today with member-only promotional savings, and this will likely be a big scramble for folks looking to score soon-to-be-retired sets before they officially sell out and are gone from LEGO’s digital shelves forever. This short-term event comes a week ahead of LEGO’s upcoming Black Friday event on November 28, 2025, and offers a bunch of promotions including multiple Insider points with purchases, GWPs, redeemable rewards, sweepstakes entries, and more. Today, before you dive into the shopping spree, we’ve provided a quick rundown below on all the available offers for this year’s LEGO Insiders Weekend, as well as a curated list of our favorite picks.

more…

items.title: How this founder’s unlikely path to Silicon Valley could become an edge in industrial tech
items.summary: Young's age and background – things that might seem like disadvantages when it comes to more established industries – have become his secret weapons. When he walks into a room of executives twice or three times his age, he says, there's initial skepticism. "Who the hell is this young guy and how does he know what he's talking about?"
